fluency1: Does the story flow from beginning to end.
fluency2: Is the ending of the story satisfying? Has it been earned?
fluency3: How much authenticity comes across in the story?
flexibility1: Does the writer traverse easily from character to character.
flexibility2: Is the writer familiar with the culture of their audience?
flexibility3: Does the writer make good use of varied sentence structure.
originality2: Is the ending out of left field (i.e. absurd for the sake of absurdity.)
originality3: Do the characters feel unique and specific?
elaboration1: How succinctly was an idea rendered.
elaboration2: Do the character's POV come across?
elaboration3: Do we understand the motive of each character?
name: ashleyperez
